snippet: Chrome, who won the Kentucky Derby and the Preakness Stakes, is the 3-5 morning-line favorite for Saturday’s race at Belmont Park.
abstract: California Chrome, winner of the Kentucky Derby and the Preakness Stakes, is the 3-5 morning-line favorite for the Belmont Stakes; if Chrome wins, he will become the 12th Triple Crown champion overall and the first since Affirmed in 1978; post positions for horses competing in the 146th running of the race noted.
lead_paragraph: Chrome, who won the Kentucky Derby and the Preakness Stakes, is the 3-5 morning-line favorite for Saturday’s race at Belmont Park.

headline.seo: Colt Will Break From No. 2 Post at Belmont Stakes in Bid for Triple Crown
headline.main: Decent Draw and Rising Hopes for California Chrome
headline.print_headline: Decent Draw and Rising Hopes for Chrome
